Talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry_00>Oh! Ouch! That hurts! <sp:5:0:0>What are
you doing?!
Talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>That's what the flowers you ruined would
be screaming, if they could scream.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>So listen to them, and don't do such
awful things!
Talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What?! Why did you bother talking to me
if you didn't need anything?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Ugh. I'm in a hurry, and he's wasting precious time.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk0027: <sp:3:0:2:0900>Wait! I already told you that, didn't I?!
Talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What is it this time? As you can
plainly seeâ€”<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>As ANYONE could plainly see, I'm
extremely busy!<sp:0:4:0>All around us is the best garden in Hyrule.
Have some respect, and try not to disturb
the plants too much.
Talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Shitauchi>Are you a professional, experienced flower
gardener? No? Then hands off, pal. <sp:5:1:0>Not
everyone knows how to handle us right!
Talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Did you really get up early to come
check on the flowers? That's sweet.
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now then! There's no time to rest!<sp:0:4:0>I need to restore Hyrule's best garden as
soon as possible, so it's ready for when
the princess returns!
Talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry_00>We told you already, that HURTS! <sp:5:0:0>What
would we do if our petals got torn off?!<sp:0:4:0>We are beautiful living things, who never
hurt anybody in this world.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>What kind of thoughtless monster would
stomp all over us?!
Talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Are you back to check on the
flowers again?
Talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Did you find yourself unable to sleep
until you'd checked on the flowers?
Talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Are you braving the rain so you could
come check on the flowers?
Talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What do you think you're doing?!<sp:0:4:0>The only things it's OK to fire our way are
smoldering gazes. <sp:5:0:0>What kind of maniac
goes around setting fire to wildlife?!
Talk0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Is that what you were hoping to hear from
us?! <sp:5:0:0>Just leave us alone already!<sp:0:4:0>Thanks to Magda and Princess Zelda's
fiery determination, we've grown into a
blaze of color across the soil!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>As if your puny fires could burn us. <sp:5:0:0>You
know nothing about the spirit it takes for
we flowers to bloom so strong!
Talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Most of the flowers that the princess and
I worked hard to plant have been ruined.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>But I'm going to work with that guy from
the stable to get the garden good as new.<sp:0:4:0>When the princess comes back, I'll be
ready to greet her with a garden that's
prettier than ever.
Talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry_00>We've told you time and again how painful
that is!<sp:0:4:0>All the world loves a flower, you know.
Flowers are beautiful, colorful, and have
a pleasant scent.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>It's no surprise that we're so cherished.
But it is surprising that you would go out
of your way to hurt us.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Angry_00>Do you think that makes you tough?
Hurting poor, innocent, defenseless
things?<sp:0:4:0>Oooh. So scary. Whatever, just don't
come near us again. Got it?
Talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Admiration_01>We love getting watered! <sp:5:0:0>You've put a tad
more lushness in our petals. Look at us
flourish under your care!<sp:0:4:0>Sure, you might've been a teeeeeensy
bit rough with us, but that's fine. <sp:5:1:0>It's the
thought that counts more than anything.
Thanks again, good friend!
Talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Shitauchi>I thought we said to keep your grubby
fingers off!<sp:0:4:0>Did you think we were complaining
because we like to hear ourselves talk?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>Now that you know we're serious, let's
hope it settles into that thick skull.
Talk0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Isn't that cute? The flowers are grateful
that you went out of your way to take care
of them.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Hee-hee. <sp:5:0:0>Thanks for showing my flowers
some love!
Talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_01>Oooh, we see what's going on here.
You're doing this on purpose for the
attention, huh?<sp:0:4:0>Look, if you want someone to talk to
you, go someplace like a stable with lots
of people around.<sp:0:4:0>There should be one somewhere north
of here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>What possessed you to pester a bunch of
farming tools for attention, anyway?!
Talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait a minute, mister. You're overdoing it.<sp:0:4:0>Can't you see what the weather's like
right now? It's raining, bud! RAINING!<sp:0:4:0>Don't try and force more water down our
throats after we've already had our fill!<sp:0:4:0>We're sure you mean well, but check in
with Magda first before you drown us out
of love.
Talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>That's what the flowers you tried to water
would beg you, if they could beg.<sp:0:4:0>I appreciate that you're trying to help,
but they've had enough water for now.
Talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Oh, are you a flower expert now?<sp:0:4:0>Sure, it got a little messed up by
the Upheaval.<sp:0:4:0>But this is genuinely the best garden
in Hyrule!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry. I have a bit of a chip on my
shoulder. I shouldn't let my temper
get the best of me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway, I'll get it back to tip-top shape
soon. So until then...<sp:0:4:0>Just look at it and imagine how it'll be
when it's once again the best garden
in Hyrule.
Talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>That's what the flowers you just ruined
would be wailing, if they could wail.<sp:0:4:0>So please don't disturb the <clr:0000>best flower
bed in Hyrule<clr:ffff>!
Talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>What is it? <sp:5:1:0>I'm busy tending this
flower bed.<sp:0:4:0>All around us is the <clr:0000>best garden in Hyrule<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
Have some respect, and try not to disturb
the plants too much.
Talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>That's what the farm tools you tried
to touch would be griping, if they
could gripe.<sp:0:4:0>I need those to work on the <clr:0000>best garden
in Hyrule<clr:ffff>, so could you please keep your
hands off?
